meanings.sent1: My mom made the specialest cake for my birthday.
meanings.sent2: This is the specialest gift I have ever received.
meanings.sent3: The cat wearing a tiny hat looked like the specialest feline in the world.
meanings.sent4: The specialest star in the sky shone brighter than all the others combined.
meanings.sent5: The specialest flower in the garden had petals that sparkled like diamonds.

meanings.definition: The most special or unique person or thing
meanings.sent1: She is the specialest student in our class.
meanings.sent2: The specialest moment of the party was when the cake caught on fire.
meanings.sent3: The specialest cupcake in the bakery was shaped like a unicorn.
meanings.sent4: The specialest book on the shelf had a cover made of gold.
meanings.sent5: The specialest toy in the store was a robot that could dance.
